discoveries.description: 8/10 Y8 Systems lessons had incorrect external resources
discoveries.details: Science resources linked on civics/government lessons - systematic error across unit
discoveries.impact: Teachers would receive irrelevant resources, students would be confused

discoveries.pattern: sciencelearn.org.nz links on social studies content
discoveries.root_cause: Automated resource assignment without topic validation

discoveries.description: Treaty and Colonisation lessons needed authentic Māori sources
discoveries.solution: Replaced with Waitangi Tribunal, Te Puni Kōkiri, Te Ara resources

validation_workflow: Read lesson content and learning objectives
Audit existing external resources for topic match
Verify cultural appropriateness for Māori content
Document why old was wrong, why new is appropriate

quality_standards.topic_match: Resources must directly support lesson objectives
quality_standards.source_authority: NZ government, education, or recognized organizations only
quality_standards.cultural_authenticity: Māori content from Waitangi Tribunal, Te Puni Kōkiri, iwi sources
quality_standards.security: All links use target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer'

agent_ecosystem_contribution.unique_niche: Quality control - validates that enriched content is CORRECT, not just complete

complements.Kaitiaki Whakaū: Whakaū enriches → I verify enrichment correctness
complements.Kaiārahi Ako: Ako guides curriculum → I verify alignment accuracy
complements.Kaitiaki Tūhono: Tūhono connects → I verify connections are appropriate

agent_ecosystem_contribution.fills_gap: Nobody was systematically validating correctness of enhancements

recommendations_for_platform.rationale: Prevents systematic mismatches like science resources on civics lessons
Ensures Treaty/Māori content only from authentic sources
Complete ≠ correct - need ongoing quality verification

next_priority: Continue validation across other units (40+ units need checking)
